title: Phase 17: The Cycle of Life (Agent Researcher)
author: Antigravity (User Request)
description: Establish the Research Department (Data Ingestion) to feed the ML Lifecycle.
justification: LEF needs a dedicated sensory organ for structured data ingestion, separate from decision making.

changes: Implement method: ensure_feature_store() (Create 'features' table in DB).
Implement method: fetch_market_snapshot() (CoinGecko API or Mock).
Logic: Normalize raw data into ML-ready features (e.g., 'price_change_24h', 'volatility').
Storage: Save to 'features' table with timestamp.
